Pagination with empty page object:

```js
const page = {};

<Pagination page={page} onSelect={() => {}} />;
```

Pagination with disabled left arrow:

```js
const page = {
  links: {
    first: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/first'
    },
    last: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/last'
    },
    next: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/next'
    },
    self: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/self'
    }
  },
  number: 0,
  size: 10,
  totalElements: 67,
  totalPages: 7
};
const onSelect = url => {
  return fetch(url);
};
<Pagination page={page} onSelect={onSelect} />;
```

Pagination with disabled right arrow:

```js
const page = {
  links: {
    first: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/first'
    },
    last: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/last'
    },
    prev: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/prev'
    },
    self: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/self'
    }
  },
  number: 1,
  size: 10,
  totalElements: 13,
  totalPages: 2
};
const onSelect = url => {
  return fetch(url);
};
<Pagination page={page} onSelect={onSelect} />;
```

Pagination with hideOnSinglePage=true and totalElements < 10 (page.size=10):

```js
const page = {
  links: {
    first: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/first'
    },
    last: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/last'
    },
    next: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/next'
    },
    self: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/self'
    }
  },
  number: 0,
  size: 10,
  totalElements: 8,
  totalPages: 1
};
const onSelect = url => {
  return fetch(url);
};
<Pagination page={page} onSelect={onSelect} />;
```

Pagination with hideOnSinglePage=false and totalElements < 10 (page.size=10):

```js
const page = {
  links: {
    first: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/first'
    },
    last: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/last'
    },
    next: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/next'
    },
    self: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/self'
    }
  },
  number: 0,
  size: 10,
  totalElements: 8,
  totalPages: 1
};
const onSelect = url => {
  return fetch(url);
};
<Pagination page={page} onSelect={onSelect} hideOnSinglePage={false} />;
```

Pagination with ability to choose amount of elements on the page:

```js
const page = {
  links: {
    first: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/first'
    },
    last: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/last'
    },
    prev: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/prev'
    },
    next: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/next'
    },
    self: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/self'
    }
  },
  number: 1,
  size: 10,
  totalElements: 23,
  totalPages: 3
};
const pageSizes = [10, 20, 30];
const checkedPageSize = pageSizes.filter(pageSize => pageSize === page.size)[0];
const onSelect = url => {
  return fetch(url);
};

<Pagination
  page={page}
  pageSizes={pageSizes}
  checkedPageSize={checkedPageSize}
  onSelect={onSelect}
  onPageSizeChange={() => {}}
/>;
```

Pagination without asynchronous requests

```js
const page = {
  links: {
    first: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/first'
    },
    last: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/last'
    },
    prev: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/prev'
    },
    self: {
      href: 'http://localhost:6060/mocks/self'
    }
  },
  number: 1,
  size: 10,
  totalElements: 61,
  totalPages: 7
};
const pageSizes = [10, 20, 30];
const checkedPageSize = undefined;

<Pagination
  isAsync={false}
  pageSizes={pageSizes}
  checkedPageSize={checkedPageSize}
  page={page}
  onSelect={() => {}}
/>;
```
